news: Malzy_Mutt barely survived a day in Vantablack Asylum! After attempting to openly express himself and his carnal fetishistic desires, the Asylum had enough of him, and some british bloke went up to him and put him out of his misery. We interviewed that bloke, here's what he had to say, "'eah 'mayte i 'illed 'im innit. i 'on't 'ike em mayte. 'jus don 'ike em." Truly a brave hero... who was reportedly caught stabbing other inmates.
